Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive API integrations and enhance UI

Major Features:
- Stock Tickers: Alpha Vantage API integration with live prices, changes, and volume
- Weather: OpenWeatherMap API with conditions, humidity, wind speed, and icons
- Movies: OMDB API with full movie details, ratings, and posters
- AI Chatbot: Groq API with multiple AI models (Llama 3.3, Mixtral, Gemma)

Enhancements:
- Enhanced database schemas with additional fields for all blueprints
- Modal dialogs for delete confirmations (tickers, weather, movies, chatbot)
- Modal-based edit form for movies (no page navigation)
- Model selection for AI chatbot with 4 different models
- Update All functionality for tickers and weather
- Dynamic API configuration status indicators
- Color-coded displays (green for gains, red for losses)
- Professional UI with Bootstrap modals and improved layouts

Technical Updates:
- Upgraded Groq library from 0.11.0 to 0.33.0
- Updated to current Groq AI models (deprecated models replaced)
- Added database migration script (fix_database_schema.py)
- Helper functions for all API integrations with error handling
- Updated website title to "Gage Riley"

API Keys Configured:
- Alpha Vantage (Stock data)
- OpenWeatherMap (Weather data)
- OMDB (Movie data)
- Groq (AI Chatbot)
